content: nena neh-nah term of endearment in spanish for girl is a pretty and dainty shawlette or scarf for any weather it can be made in any type fibre and an appropiate hook to give desired drape you can choose to use from a lace weight or even a dk but take into account the heavier or thicker the yarn the bigger the stitches will be the pattern is both written in english and charted hand drawn using usa crochet terms and abbreviations stitches used are chain slip_stitch single_crochet and double_crochet this is a free pattern you may sell your finished projects please give me credit as the designer and link to ravelry for download thank you i hope you enjoy making the shawl let me know if you find any mistakes or if there is something you don t understand i d like to thank my lovely testers here on ravelry for their invaluable help ♥ now in dutch translation graciously provided by annie germeraad annyoneg2 on ravelry note please do not translate this pattern to other languages without my permission first if you need anything let me know and i ll help as best i can thanks nota favor de no traducir este patrón a otros idiomas sin mi permiso si necesitas algo me lo haces saber y ayudaré con todo gusto gracias
